item.title: FHN
item.description: score:42 Chances: First Horizon has been recognized as one of the best-in-state employers and banks by Forbes, reflecting a positive company image. The company has received awards and designations, such as the Savings Excellence Award and Best Employers for Women, highlighting its commitment to excellence.
